resultPayload.note: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.
Demand-pricing policy configured and verified through API + agent tools.

data.instruction: Set demand pricing rules (for example peak-hour/holiday overrides) and verify they can be applied to bookable offers.
data.expectedResult: Demand pricing policy exists and can influence offer/booking totals.

resultPayload.note: Demand-pricing policy configured and verified through API + agent tools.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Time-limited accept/decline window". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
